TopicTitle: How to delete jour Tracking Station Data

Articles.Content:
Hi everybody,

wan't to get rid of your debris and your vessels in space?

I've found a way to do it!

Inside your KSP folder, open "saves" -> "default" and delete the file "persistent.sfs".

After starting the game, it will automatically create a new file.

Sorry if my grammar isn't good, I'm from Germany, so I only learn English at school.

The Pilot

Be aware this will also delete anything you have in orbit or landed on another body.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hi The Pilot, welcome to the community

Well done on finding that out, I think it's quite well known at this point though, but did you know the persistence file is plain text and can be opened in notepad?

You can edit out individual ships or debris, and do a lot of more crazy things if you are careful, backup your file first before tinkering
